name: The Chosen
luck_special: When you spend a point of Luck, the Keeper will bring your fate into play.

required_moves.name: Destiny’s Plaything
required_moves.description: At the beginning of each mystery, roll +Weird to see what is revealed about your immediate future. On a 10+, the Keeper will reveal a useful detail about the coming mystery. On a 7-9 you get a vague hint about it. On a miss, something bad is going to happen to you.

required_moves.name: I’m Here For A Reason
required_moves.description: There’s something you are destined to do. Work out the details with the Keeper, based on your fate. You cannot die until it comes to pass. If you die in play, then you must spend a Luck point. You will then, somehow, recover or be returned to life. Once your task is done (or you use up all your Luck), all bets are off.

optional_moves.name: The Big Entrance
optional_moves.description: When you make a showy entrance into a dangerous situation, roll +Cool. On 10+ everyone stops to watch and listen until you finish your opening speech. On a 7-9, you pick one person or monster to stop, watch and listen until you finish talking. On a miss, you’re marked as the biggest threat by all enemies who are present.

optional_moves.name: Devastating
optional_moves.description: When you inflict harm, you may inflict +1 harm.

optional_moves.name: Dutiful
optional_moves.description: When your fate rears its ugly head, and you act in accordance with any of your fate tags(either heroic or doom) then mark experience. If it’s a heroic tag, take +1 forward.

optional_moves.name: Invincible
optional_moves.description: You always count as having 2-armour. This doesn’t stack with other protection.

optional_moves.name: Resilience
optional_moves.description: You heal faster than normal people. Any time your harm gets healed, heal an extra point. Additionally, your wounds count as 1-harm less for the purpose of the Keeper’s harm moves.

history: You are close blood relations. Ask them exactly how close.
They are destined to be your mentor. Tell them how this was revealed.
Your best friend in the world, who you trust totally.
A rival at first, but you came to a working arrangement.
Romantic entanglement, or fated to be romantically entangled.
Just friends, from school or work or something. Ask them what.
They could have been the Chosen One instead of you, but they failed some trial. Tell them how they failed.
You saved their life, back when they didn’t know monsters were real. Tell them what you saved them from.
improvements: Take a move from another playbook.

advanced_improvements: Get back one used Luck point.
Change this hunter to a new type.
Create a second hunter to play as well as this one.
Mark two of the basic moves as advanced.
Mark another two of the basic moves as advanced.
Delete one of your Doom tags, and (optionally) one of your Heroic tags. You have changed that aspect of your destiny.
